title: Get Maps from Bing Maps Static Map API
text: bingmapr R packge retrieving plotting maps Bing Static Maps API. created package May 2021 primarily access Bing’s Bird’s Eye (oblique-angle) imagery routes traffic features API currently supported. immediate plans add features package pull requests welcome. package inspired snapbox package allows use maps Mapbox static map API ggplot maps. hope integrate bingmapr ggplot future. can also explore static map API browser using Bing Static Map Maker made Katy DeCorah.

title: Get Maps from Bing Maps Static Map API
text: package requires Bing Maps API Key can get : https://www.bingmapsportal.com/ examples can run installed key:
code: bing_maps_api_key(key = "put your key here", install = TRUE) # Get request URL centered on Washington Square Park in New York, NY get_request_url(location = c(40.7308349, -73.99746074), orientation = "W")  # Get an sf object to show how bingmapr can use sf objects for locations nc <- sf::st_read(system.file("shape/nc.shp", package = "sf"))  # Plot a static map showing the center of Wake County, North Carolina get_map_image(location = nc[nc$NAME == "Wake", ], orientation = 180)  # Plot static map centered 300 meters north and 500 meters west of the center get_map_image(location = nc[nc$NAME == "Wake", ], orientation = 180, nudge = c(300, 500))

title: Get and plot Bing Static Maps — bing_static_map
text: location sf, sfc, bbox object (centroid point used location) numeric vector format c(latitude, longitude). Defaults NULL. query String query location. query ignored location provided.  Defaults NULL. imagery String imagery type, Default: 'BirdsEye' Supported values include: Aerial: Aerial imagery. AerialWithLabels: Aerial imagery road overlay. AerialWithLabelsOnDemand: Aerial imagery -demand road overlay. Streetside: Street-level imagery. BirdsEye: Birds Eye (oblique-angle) imagery. BirdsEyeWithLabels: Birds Eye (oblique-angle) imagery road overlay. Road: Roads without additional imagery. CanvasDark: dark version road maps. CanvasLight: lighter version road maps also details hill shading disabled. CanvasGray: grayscale version road maps width, height, mapsize Width height pixels use mapsize provide vector c(width, height). mapsize provided, width height ignored. Default: 600px width, 400px height, mapsize NULL. zoom Numeric vector 0 20 imagery Bird's Eye maps 18 22 Bird's Eye maps. Default: 18 orientation Orientation character string ("N", "E", "S", "W") length 1 numeric vector (0,90,180,270). numeric orientations (-360 720) matched closest value, e.g. 35 0 75 90. Default: 0 nudge Numeric vector format, c(meters shift latitude, meters shift longitude), e.g. c(100, 0) shift center 100 meters latitude.  Defaults NULL. key Bing Maps API Key, Default: Sys.getenv("BING_MAPS_API_KEY") check TRUE, check map metadata returns error image unavailable. Default FALSE. .perform TRUE, return results httr2::req_perform(). FALSE, return request. ... Additional parameters passed httr2::req_url_query() strip drop image comments metadata bbox TRUE, return bbox class object based bounding box values map metadata. FALSE (default), return full JSON metadata. (get_map_meta() )
